Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
Represents a vending machine. Contains objects of Item, ItemSlot, Denominations, and Transaction classes and corresponding methods to simulate vending features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VendingMachine(int slots)
    Constructs a VendingMachine object with the specified number of slots.

    • computeMoneyInMachine

      public void computeMoneyInMachine(Denominations denominations, VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Computes and sets the amount of money currently in the vending machine based on the denominations provided.
      Parameters:
      denominations - the denominations object containing the count of each denomination
      vendingMachine - the vending machine object to update with the computed money amount

    • displayItems

      Displays the items available in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - the vending machine object containing the items to display

    • purchaseItem

      public void purchaseItem(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Allows the user to purchase items from the vending machine. Contains logic for calculating change and updating corresponding object attributes.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine -

    • stockItem

      public void stockItem(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Stocks a new item in the vending machine by adding it to the item slots.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - The vending machine object in which the item is to be stocked.

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Restocks an item in the vending machine by increasing its quantity.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - The vending machine object containing the item slots to be restocked.

    • setItemPrice

      public void setItemPrice(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Sets the price of an item in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - The vending machine object containing the item slots.

    • collectMoney

      public void collectMoney(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Collects the money from the vending machine and performs the necessary actions. This method computes the total amount of money in the vending machine, prints the total amount collected, empties the denominations in the machine, and provides a reminder to replenish cash before the next purchase.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - The VendingMachine object representing the vending machine.

    • replenishMoney

      public void replenishMoney(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Replenishes the denominations inside the vending machine based on user input
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine -

    • displayTransactions

      public void displayTransactions(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Displays the transaction log of the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - The VendingMachine object containing the transaction log to be displayed.
